parameters: Fade out the screen and show the black bars for the cinematic effect.
Since we aren't using the player, we're going to need to halt
his movement and prevent menu opening, to do this we can simply
use a switch. Without this happening, the player can click to
move the player which will reveal the box-clicky thing
switch to stop movement and prevent opening menu
Change the blank events to mimick our party, set their location, and
make our current party hidden. Uncheck "wait for completion" in set movement
change screens tint and start a screen scroll, then fade in
First, we'll tint it all the way black to make the smooth
Now we fade in the screen to the desired color for 120 frames, or 2 seconds
Move the new party to the left, just before the baddy jumps down
and stops them. Uncheck wait for completion once again and estimate
or playtest to find out how many frames you'll need to wait before
the next action. We want harold to face Therese before she's done moving.
This can also be done in set move rout for harold, but either way works
For therese's last step, we're going to make her walk a bit
We start the dialogue. Make sure the window is transparent, and
you only use the 2 bottom lines of text. We're going to use show
picture to slide in the emotes
-- Start the picture at 734 x and 530 y
Slide it to 730 x and 530 y for about 20 frames, don't wait for
Richard we cleared out the southern kingdoms, Lamar is free. \|\|\^
That's great Cedric the northern kingdoms are safe as well. I brought - \|\|\^
- Idelle with me as she gave birth. \|\|\^
He’s perfect, my heir is born. We should name him Odaris to commemorate - \|\|\^
- this day of great change for the realm. \|\|\^
Well on the other side of things, a lot of the kingdoms lack rulers so - \|\|\^
- we face a possible risk of wars taking place. \|\|\^
Maybe Roswell’s plan wasn’t such a bad idea? Just the way he sought to - \|\|\^
Well think about it, surely if the kingdoms became one, the need to go - \|\|\^
- to war of each other would go. \|\|\^
It does make sense and would probably be the easier option than going to - \|\|\^
- each kingdom and putting someone in power. As we saw with Roswell, - \|\|\^
- it didn't quite work out. But if we went through with this plan who - \|\|\^
Well Idelle and I could. We already have the support of Luthania being - \|\|\^
- my seat of power, Rossmaur and Spaul are allies and so would support - \|\|\^
- my claim. We're already managing the southern kingdoms apart from Hyde - \|\|\^
- and Payne. So, all we need to do is persuade Rouge, Grispon, Hyde and - \|\|\^
Hmm I don’t think it’s a good idea. \|\|\^
Where do I begin, he tried to have me killed. Why would I want to have - \|\|\^
I thought we had made amends about this, I explained that I wasn’t the - \|\|\^
We only just started afresh Dormato, frankly, how do I know your intentions are - \|\|\^
- pure? Also what about the way you ran your own kingdom for the last couple - \|\|\^
- of months. If I hadn’t come to help your own people would have overthrown you. - \|\|\^
I accept that I was doing terribly and have vowed to run things a lot better. - \|\|\^
- Odaria needs a change Cedric. Give me a chance? \|\|\^
Fine, I will back it. But you need to take things seriously. \|\|\^
Well then, we will do that, you two will rule. \|\|\^
Well I’ll stay here with Idelle. You two should go. \|\|\^
Yes, we will, we’ll go to Rouge first. \|\|\^
I want  to go see the baby first then I will be ready. \|\|\^
Ok I will be waiting for you. \|\|\^
